Articles.Content: Hello guys I was wondering of anybody nows of the interstellar mod is still usable whit the 0.2.4 update or of they gonna update it soon? Anybody nows somthing please let me now i realy like that mod

Hello, and welcome to the forums! There is a subforum dedicated to mods if you search the forums a little. Here's the Interstellar mod thread (for your convenience):http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-23-5-KSP-Interstellar-%28Toolbar-Integration-New-Models-New-Tech%29-Version-0-11

Also, there's a magical thing called "Google"
Hello overlordmas. Yes, there is indeed a thread for that mod, as turkwinif has helpfully pointed out. Please refer to the discussion there.
